text: I watched a Mets clip from 2015, and remembered the story of Wilmer Flores that was spark that lit the fire for the Mets amazing late summer and postseason that year. He isn't on the Mets anymore, he's with the Arizona Diamondbacks. Seeing his picture makes me worry for his mental health. Here was a boy who cried when he thought he was traded. We all loved him for that. This is sad.
